titleStmt.title: A mery play betwene Iohan Iohan the husbande, Tyb his wyfe, [and] syr Iha[n]n the preest
titleStmt.author: Heywood, John, 1497?-1580?, attributed name.

publicationStmt.date: the .xii. day of February the yere of our lord.M.ccccc. and xxxiii] [1533]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
